snippet: A day after 16 people were killed in an accident at an outdoor concert in South Korea, a man involved in the show’s planning died in an apparent suicide, officials said.
abstract: South Korean man involved in planning outdoor pop concert where 16 people were killed after falling through ventilation grate is found dead in apparent suicide.
lead_paragraph: A day after 16 people were killed in an accident at an outdoor concert in South Korea, a man involved in the show’s planning died in an apparent suicide, officials said.

headline.main: Planner of Pop Concert Found Dead in South Korea
headline.print_headline: Planner of Pop Concert Found Dead
